1
1 -> 1
2
11, 00 -> 2
3
100, 001, 111 -> 3
4
0000, 0011, 1100, 1001, 1111 -> 5
5
00001, 00100, 00111, 10000, 10011, 11001, 11100, 11111 -> 8
6
000000, 000011, 001100, 001001, 001111, 100001, 100100, 100111, 110000, 110011, 111001, 111100, 111111 -> 13

a(n) = a(n-1) + 계차
a(n) = (a(n-1)-a(n-2))

1 2 3 4 5 6
1 2 3 5 8 12
